content:
The Defender Series is a great choice for maximum protection.

And wow, congratulations on selling your old iPhone 11 for $400! That's a great deal, and it's awesome that you were able to offset the cost of your new phone. You must be thrilled to have upgraded to a new device while also making some extra cash.

Selling your old phone can be a great way to recoup some of the costs of upgrading, and it's always satisfying to get a good price for your used device. Did you use any specific strategies or platforms to sell your iPhone 11, or was it just a private sale to a friend?

Also, are you planning on using any other accessories with your new phone, such as a screen protector, headphones, or a wallet case?
